Reviews.Title: Pretty bad security camera
Reviews.Author: jschristian44
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this buying it with no reviews.  It looked nice because it had it's own wireless uplink.  Anyways, I hooked the wireless thing up to the tv.  That was pretty easy, it connects just like a video game console.  The camera was pretty small.  A lot smaller than I thought it would be, which is nice for a security camera.  Anyways, I used a new battery I think for the 9v and it wouldn't keep the signal at all.  It might've been the battery though.  It worked well when it was plugged in, but who want's to plug in a wireless camera.  Anyways, I used it in a bright room and the image was very dark and the colors were washed out.  I tried using the manual focus and it made it a little better focused, but you still couldn't see anything well at all.  Not even VHS quality image.  The feed was pretty bad.  I suggest getting something that people have reviewed already.  But take my advice, keep searching for a security camera, you won't like this one.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but could be better
Reviews.Author: G. Haskins
Reviews.Content: This item is not as easy as it was described. but it does works fine.  But actually, better is http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000YM2OIK for the wireless signal and video frame display.  You can only view one attached device at a time.  Installation is easy, it comes with a CD.

Reviews.Title: Junk! Don't buy it!
Reviews.Author: gary kurtz
Reviews.Content: Ended up buying this to test it out. It ended up only pumping out static no matter what channel it was set to. Something was rattling around the inside of the box when it was shaken, ended up being a giant chunk of solder!Stay clear of this product!

Reviews.Title: Dont Work
Reviews.Author: Mark M
Reviews.Content: IT worked for one night then stopped. I tried to reload software but still wont work, sending it back, REFUND Please.
